argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a b

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lmhmlin.k | |- K = ( Scalar ` S ) |
| 2 |  | lmhmlin.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 3 |  | lmhmlin.e | |- E = ( Base ` S ) |
| 4 |  | lmhmlin.m | |- .x. = ( .s ` S ) |
| 5 |  | lmhmlin.n | |- .X. = ( .s ` T ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` T ) = ( Scalar ` T ) |
| 7 | 1, 6, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_islmhm | |- ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) <-> ( ( S e. LMod /\ T e. LMod ) /\ ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) /\ ( Scalar ` T ) = K /\ A. a e. B A. b e. E ( F ` ( a .x. b ) ) = ( a .X. ( F ` b ) ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_simprbi | |- ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) -> ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) /\ ( Scalar ` T ) = K /\ A. a e. B A. b e. E ( F ` ( a .x. b ) ) = ( a .X. ( F ` b ) ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_simp3d | |- ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) -> A. a e. B A. b e. E ( F ` ( a .x. b ) ) = ( a .X. ( F ` b ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( a = X -> ( a .x. b ) = ( X .x. b ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( a = X -> ( F ` ( a .x. b ) ) = ( F ` ( X .x. b ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( a = X -> ( a .X. ( F ` b ) ) = ( X .X. ( F ` b ) ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_eqeq12d | |- ( a = X -> ( ( F ` ( a .x. b ) ) = ( a .X. ( F ` b ) ) <-> ( F ` ( X .x. b ) ) = ( X .X. ( F ` b ) ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( b = Y -> ( X .x. b ) = ( X .x. Y ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( b = Y -> ( F ` ( X .x. b ) ) = ( F ` ( X .x. Y ) ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( b = Y -> ( F ` b ) = ( F ` Y ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( b = Y -> ( X .X. ( F ` b ) ) = ( X .X. ( F ` Y ) ) ) |
| 18 | 15, 17 | #P_eqeq12d | |- ( b = Y -> ( ( F ` ( X .x. b ) ) = ( X .X. ( F ` b ) ) <-> ( F ` ( X .x. Y ) ) = ( X .X. ( F ` Y ) ) ) ) |
| 19 | 13, 18 | #P_rspc2v | |- ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. E ) -> ( A. a e. B A. b e. E ( F ` ( a .x. b ) ) = ( a .X. ( F ` b ) ) -> ( F ` ( X .x. Y ) ) = ( X .X. ( F ` Y ) ) ) ) |
| 20 | 9, 19 | #P_syl5com | |- ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) -> ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. E ) -> ( F ` ( X .x. Y ) ) = ( X .X. ( F ` Y ) ) ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_3impib | |- ( ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) /\ X e. B /\ Y e. E ) -> ( F ` ( X .x. Y ) ) = ( X .X. ( F ` Y ) ) ) |
